{"id":385641417,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 1 week","timestamp":1598272557,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/385641417/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"70.1 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode  head;\n        ListNode *pHead = &head,*pPrev = &head;\n        int nCarry = 0 ;\n        int nSum = 0 ;\n        while ( nCarry || l1 || l2){\n            nSum = (l1 ? l1->val :0) + (l2? l2->val : 0)  + nCarry ; \n            nCarry = nSum / 10 ;\n            ListNode* pCur = new ListNode(nSum%10);\n            \n            l1 = (l1? l1->next : l1);\n            l2 = (l2? l2->next : l2);\n            pPrev->next = pCur ; \n            pPrev = pCur;\n            \n        }\n       return pHead->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
